text: Guy Lorin Reschenthaler ( ; born April 17, 1983) is an American politician, attorney, judge, and U.S. Navy veteran. He is a member of the Republican Party. He has been the U.S. representative for since 2019. He has also been the Republican Chief Deputy Whip since 2023. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Guy Reschenthaler official U.S. House website * Campaign website * * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Lawyers from Pittsburgh Category:Politicians from Pittsburgh Category:American judges Category:Military people from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Guy Reschenthaler
